creator: TapBlaze
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own Pizza shop? Now you can with TapBlaze’s newest game, Good Pizza, Great Pizza! Do your best to fulfill pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open. Upgrade your shop with new toppings and equipment to compete against your pizza rival, Alicante!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS

* Featuring Pizza News Network (PNN), the first newscast about all things pizza.
* Over 50 customers with unique pizza orders and personalities.
* Pizza toppings including pepperoni, sausage, onions, and more.
* Equipment upgrades to help you become the master ovenist.
* Simple, fun and challenging gameplay.
* Created by pizza making professionals; the game designer worked in a pizza kitchen for four years!

Can you become the master ovenist? Only time and your pizza skills will tell!

Download and start pizza making now!

Privacy Policy:
http://www.tapblaze.com/about/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
http://www.tapblaze.com/about/terms-conditions/
descriptionShort: Fun Pizza Business Simulator

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hello Master Ovenists! Are you busy googling ‘mother’s day gifts’ like we are?

To a mother, one of the greatest gifts in life are said to be her children! What can be better than spending precious quality time with her bundle of joy?

This coming Mother’s Day, be prepared to cook a Mother’s Day miracle for a certain someone!
Now, roll your sleeves, get set, bake!

If you have any issues, please don’t hesitate to ask us at pizza@tapblaze.com!
Thank you for cooking with us!”

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Ver. 3.4.5 Release Notes: MyPad Skins, FAQ + More!
Hey Ovenists!
Are you in for a little summer treat?
The newest updated version 3.4.5 is available now!
New:
* MyPad Skins
* ‘What?’ Tutorial
* FAQ
Improvements:
* Gradual level increase in first few game days
* Re-watchable ads for bankruptcy
* Improvements on minor translation issues
Bug Fixes:
* Minor bugs and order error fix
You could press ‘Contact’ in-game or email pizza@tapblaze.com for any issues! Have a gouda day!

title: Good Pizza, Great Pizza

creator: TapBlaze
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own Pizza shop? Now you can with TapBlaze’s newest game, Good Pizza, Great Pizza! Do your best to fulfill pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open. Upgrade your shop with new toppings and equipment to compete against your pizza rival, Alicante!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS

* Featuring Pizza News Network (PNN), the first newscast about all things pizza.
* Over 50 customers with unique pizza orders and personalities.
* Pizza toppings including pepperoni, sausage, onions, and more.
* Equipment upgrades to help you become the master ovenist.
* Simple, fun and challenging gameplay.
* Created by pizza making professionals; the game designer worked in a pizza kitchen for four years!

Can you become the master ovenist? Only time and your pizza skills will tell!

Download and start pizza making now!

title: Good Pizza, Great Pizza

creator: TapBlaze
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own Pizza shop? Now you can with TapBlaze’s newest game, Good Pizza, Great Pizza! Do your best to fulfill pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open. Upgrade your shop with new toppings and equipment to compete against your pizza rival, Alicante!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS

* Featuring Pizza News Network (PNN), the first newscast about all things pizza.
* Over 50 customers with unique pizza orders and personalities.
* Pizza toppings including pepperoni, sausage, onions, and more.
* Equipment upgrades to help you become the master ovenist.
* Simple, fun and challenging gameplay.
* Created by pizza making professionals; the game designer worked in a pizza kitchen for four years!

Can you become the master ovenist? Only time and your pizza skills will tell!

Download and start pizza making now!

title: Good Pizza, Great Pizza

creator: TapBlaze
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own Pizza shop? Now you can with TapBlaze’s newest game, Good Pizza, Great Pizza! Do your best to fulfill pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open. Upgrade your shop with new toppings and equipment to compete against your pizza rival, Alicante!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS

* Featuring Pizza News Network (PNN), the first newscast about all things pizza.
* Over 50 customers with unique pizza orders and personalities.
* Pizza toppings including pepperoni, sausage, onions, and more.

* Created by pizza making professionals; the game designer worked in a pizza kitchen for four years!

Can you become the master ovenist? Only time and your pizza skills will tell!

Download and start pizza making now!

Do your best to fulfill pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open. Upgrade your shop with new toppings and equipment to compete against your pizza rival, Alicante!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS

* Featuring Pizza News Network (PNN), the first newscast about all things pizza.
* Over 50 customers with unique pizza orders and personalities.
* Pizza toppings including pepperoni, sausage, onions, and more.
* Equipment upgrades to help you become the master ovenist.
* Simple, fun and challenging gameplay.
* Created by pizza making professionals; the game designer worked in a pizza kitchen for four years!

Can you become the master ovenist? Only time and your pizza skills will tell!

Download and start pizza making now!

Privacy Policy:
http://www.tapblaze.com/about/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
http://www.tapblaze.com/about/terms-conditions/
descriptionShort: Become the pizza master in this fun cooking game!

title: Good Pizza, Great Pizza

creator: TapBlaze
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own Pizza shop? Now you can with TapBlaze’s newest game, Good Pizza, Great Pizza! Do your best to fulfill pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open. Upgrade your shop with new toppings and equipment to compete against your pizza rival, Alicante!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS

* Featuring Pizza News Network (PNN), the first newscast about all things pizza.
* Over 50 customers with unique pizza orders and personalities.
* Pizza toppings including pepperoni, sausage, onions, and more.
* Equipment upgrades to help you become the master ovenist.
* Simple, fun and challenging gameplay.
* Created by pizza making professionals; the game designer worked in a pizza kitchen for four years!

Can you become the master ovenist? Only time and your pizza skills will tell!

Download and start pizza making now!

title: Good Pizza, Great Pizza

creator: TapBlaze
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own Pizza shop? Now you can with TapBlaze’s newest game, Good Pizza, Great Pizza! Do your best to fulfill pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open. Upgrade your shop with new toppings and equipment to compete against your pizza rival, Alicante!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS

* Featuring Pizza News Network (PNN), the first newscast about all things pizza.
* Over 50 customers with unique pizza orders and personalities.
* Pizza toppings including pepperoni, sausage, onions, and more.
* Equipment upgrades to help you become the master ovenist.
* Simple, fun and challenging gameplay.
* Created by pizza making professionals; the game designer worked in a pizza kitchen for four years!

Can you become the master ovenist? Only time and your pizza skills will tell!

Download and start pizza making now!

title: Good Pizza, Great Pizza

creator: TapBlaze
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own Pizza shop? Now you can with TapBlaze’s newest cooking game, Good Pizza, Great Pizza! Do your best to fulfill pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your restuarant open. Upgrade your restaurant with new toppings, decor and kitchen equipment to compete against your pizza rival, Alicante!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS

🍕 Featuring Pizza News Network (PNN), the first newscast about all things pizza.
🍕 Over 100 customers with unique pizza orders and personalities.
🍕 Pizza toppings including pepperoni, sausage, onions, and more.
🍕 Equipment upgrades to help you become the master ovenist.
🍕 Simple, fun and challenging cooking game.
🍕 Created by pizza making professionals; the game designer worked in a pizza kitchen for four years!

Can you become the master ovenist? Only time and your pizza skills will tell!

Download and start pizza making now!

title: Good Pizza, Great Pizza

creator: TapBlaze
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own Pizza shop? Now you can with TapBlaze’s newest game, Good Pizza, Great Pizza! Do your best to fulfill pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open. Upgrade your shop with new toppings and equipment to compete against your pizza rival, Alicante!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS

* Featuring Pizza News Network (PNN), the first newscast about all things pizza.
* Over 50 customers with unique pizza orders and personalities.
* Pizza toppings including pepperoni, sausage, onions, and more.
* Equipment upgrades to help you become the master ovenist.
* Simple, fun and challenging gameplay.
* Created by pizza making professionals; the game designer worked in a pizza kitchen for four years!

Can you become the master ovenist? Only time and your pizza skills will tell!

Download and start pizza making now!

title: Good Pizza, Great Pizza

creator: TapBlaze
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own Pizza shop? Now you can with TapBlaze’s newest game, Good Pizza, Great Pizza! Do your best to fulfill pizza orders from customers while making enough money to keep your shop open. Upgrade your shop with new toppings and equipment to compete against your pizza rival, Alicante!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS

* Featuring Pizza News Network (PNN), the first newscast about all things pizza.
* Over 50 customers with unique pizza orders and personalities.
* Pizza toppings including pepperoni, sausage, onions, and more.
* Equipment upgrades to help you become the master ovenist.
* Simple, fun and challenging gameplay.
* Created by pizza making professionals; the game designer worked in a pizza kitchen for four years!

Can you become the master ovenist? Only time and your pizza skills will tell!

Download and start pizza making now!

title:
Good Pizza, Great Pizza
5.27.0

creator: TapBlaze
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to know what it feels like to run your own cozy Pizza shop? Now you can with TapBlaze's exciting, story-driven cooking game, Good Pizza, Great Pizza!

Do your best as a chef to fulfill pizza orders from customers and make enough money to keep your restaurant open. If you wish to earn big, make sure to keep a charming and decorative shop! Advance the storyline and upgrade your restaurant with new toppings, decor and kitchen equipment to compete against your pizza rivals in each chapter!

A new chapter, more seasonal events and limited time decorations release each year! Download now and experience running a restaurant and your daily life as a pizza chef. This pizza cooking game is free to play!

Game Highlights
🍕 Over 200 customers with unique pizza orders and personalities!
🍕 Pizza toppings including pepperoni, sausage, onions, and more.
🍕 4 different chapters, 4 different chefs to beat, and even more side stories all in one cooking game!!
🍕 Equipment upgrades fit for Master Ovenist!
🍕 Customizable and collectible restaurant interior decorations!
🍕 Featuring Pizza News Network (PNN), the first newscast about all things pizza.
🍕 Pizza cooking ASMR that will leave you craving a slice!

Game Story Chapters
A new chapter, more seasonal events and limited time decorations release each year! Currently there are 4 released chapters, Chapter 5 in the making, bi-monthly seasonal cooking events with refreshing new stories and new restaurant features!
📙Chapter 1: Beat your grouchy next door rival and keep your new pizza restaurant open on the block! Only one restaurant can claim the top spot!
📗Chapter 2: Legend of your pizza cooking skills attract the most mysterious foodie group to your restaurant! Pass their tests and break the final spell!
📘Chapter 3: Challenge the world's most renowned pizza rankers! Last year’s winning cook seems to make suspiciously and scientifically perfect pizzas.. Can you take this year’s crown?
📕Chapter 4: Angelica Béchamel seems determined to take over the pizza industry with her robot cooking chefs. Join hands with the WPA and your old mates to save the mom and pop restaurants!
📖Chapter 5📖 To release in winter 2023-2024! ZARENA is coming with new rival stories and new cooking game features..🤫

Fun Facts
💓 This cooking restaurant game is created by pizza making professionals; the game artist worked in a pizza kitchen for four years!
💓 GOOD PIZZA, GREAT PIZZA has published official original soundtracks
💓 GOOD PIZZA, GREAT PIZZA has been downloaded over 250 million times globally!

This simple, fun and challenging cooking game is free to play!
Download now and start your pizza chef story!

Privacy Policy:
http://www.tapblaze.com/about/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
http://www.tapblaze.com/about/terms-conditions/
